subject: Power Supply for Pedals and Haptic Reactors
description_text:
Hi, 

I just purchase the Pro X Ultra pedals and Haptic Reactors.

What power supply do I need for the pedals?

Do I need a separate power supply for the haptic reactors and if so, what do I need?

Thanks for your help.

Kind regards,
Adam Shelton
M: 07585 110811

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 8005 中
